sn56.129-130:1.1: … “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, appaka te satta ye pettivisaya cuta devesu paccajayanti; atha kho eteva bahutara satta ye pettivisaya cuta niraye paccajayanti …pe…
sn56.129-130:1.2: evameva kho, bhikkhave, appaka te satta ye pettivisaya cuta devesu paccajayanti; atha kho eteva bahutara satta ye pettivisaya cuta tiracchanayoniya paccajayanti …pe….
